abstract: Missouri Gov Jay Nixon faces challenge of trying to implement recommendations of Ferguson Commission he appointed in 2014 with just over a year left in his second term and an opposition-controlled General Assembly; Nixon's legacy on Ferguson will be determined by how effective he can be in cobbling together majority to enact changes proposed by commission.
lead_paragraph: As Mr. Nixon’s days in office wind down, he is studying the broad policy changes recommended by the Ferguson Commission.

headline.main: Missouri Governor Jay Nixon’s Legacy Firmly Linked to Ferguson
headline.print_headline: Missouri Governor’s Legacy Firmly Linked to Ferguson

snippet: As Mr. Nixon’s days in office wind down, he is studying the broad policy changes recommended by the Ferguson Commission.
